text: notice of tentative agreement required a public employer shall post notice of a tentative agreement on any new or amended collective bargaining agreement in a conspicuous place on the public employer s internet website the public employer shall also make available for inspection an electronic copy of the tentative agreement on any new or amended collective bargaining agreement on the public employer s internet website both the notice of the tentative agreement and the electronic copy of the tentative agreement shall remain on the public employer s internet website for not less than days after the signing of the tentative agreement
